Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Given its value to you, I propose a special introductory offer of $7,500 for this exceptional item. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a competitive price, tailored to meet your specific requirements. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to serve you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
